title: Woe for thousands of peer-to-peer investors as FundingSecure platform collapses
text:
The troubled peer-to-peer sector has been dealt a further blow after another platform, FundingSecure, fell into administration.

The firm had offered investors returns of up 15pc for lending their cash against items including art, vintage cars and watches, making it akin to a high-end pawnbroker.

However, the platform was hit with widespread defaults as borrowers failed to repay their loans on time. Around 3,500 customers have £80m invested in the company, with their cash spread across 486 loans, administrators said.
